abstract: When investors gather in Omaha, Neb., in two weeks for the Berkshire Hathaway annual meeting, the chairman, Warren E. Buffett, will face what has become the annual question: who might someday succeed him in each of the two roles he plays – chief executive and chief investment officer?

headline.main: A Maestro of Investments in the Style of Buffett
